update sso_system
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
system_code = #{systemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detail_explain = #{detailExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
available = #{available,jdbcType=BIT},

update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sso_system set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, system_code = #{systemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_explain = #{detailExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, available = #{available,jdbcType=BIT}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from sso_system su
1=1
and su.name like concat('%',#{name}, '%')
and su.system_code like concat('%',#{systemCode},'%')
and su.available = #{available}
